name: Boom Boom Flyers
description:
Another premium production by the credited Gulag Games Inc.

In this amazing 4-man local player vs. player arena game you play as a helicopter trying to bombard the enemy players, simple right?

Exactly 3 seagulls, a hamster, and a virgin were fatally slain during creating this product. 

Requires direct input controllers.

Warning, may contain trains and subtle political tones/propaganda... we mean nvm.
